overview:
David Crozier is a web content editor specialising in startups, international trade, social media, digital content, entrepreneurship and innovation.

In addition to working for Northern Ireland’s regional development agency, Invest Northern Ireland, David mentors a number of startup companies including Newsrupt and SpikeyTrousers.

He holds a Bachelors degree in Computer Science from the University of Ulster at Coleraine and a Masters degree in Innovation and Entrepreneurship from the University of Ulster at Jordanstown. Professional experience includes technical roles with Intel Corporation, Jinny Software (a Dublin, Ireland based startup) and the UK Government. He has also provided policy advice on legislation to UK Government ministers as well as product managing mobile and knowledge management products for Belfast based Lagan Technologies a key supplier of CRM and 311 solutions to government customers in the UK and North America.
